hero.title: Transforming Smiles with Precision, Creating Confident Futures
hero.subtitle: Experience world-class dental treatments in Istanbul with Avenue Clinic—where your oral health and aesthetics come first, at prices up to 70% lower than global averages.

treatments.title: OUR TREATMENTS
treatments.subtitle: Comprehensive dental care tailored for every smile

dentalImplants.title: Dental Implants
dentalImplants.description: Dental implants are the top choice for replacing missing teeth, offering a durable, natural-looking solution.

hero.title: Reclaim Your Smile with Lasting Dental Implants
hero.description: Dental implants provide a permanent and natural-looking solution to missing teeth, allowing you to smile, eat, and speak with confidence. Designed to integrate seamlessly with your jawbone, our implants offer stability, durability, and a restoration that feels like your own teeth.

benefits.title: Overview and Key Benefits of Dental Implants
benefits.description: Dental implants are a state-of-the-art solution to replace missing teeth, designed to restore both functionality and aesthetics. Unlike dentures or bridges, implants are surgically placed in the jawbone, providing unmatched support and longevity. Ideal for patients looking for a permanent fix, implants can transform your smile and improve oral health.

natural_appearance.title: Natural-Looking Appearance
natural_appearance.description: Dental implants blend seamlessly with your natural teeth, restoring your smile's aesthetics and giving you a look you can feel confident about.

improved_chewing.title: Improved Chewing and Eating Comfort
improved_chewing.description: Unlike dentures, dental implants function like natural teeth, allowing you to eat your favorite foods without discomfort or worry.

enhanced_speech.title: Enhanced Speech
enhanced_speech.description: Missing teeth or ill-fitting dentures can make speech challenging. Implants offer stability, helping you speak clearly and confidently.

long_lasting.title: Long-Lasting Solution
long_lasting.description: With proper care, dental implants are designed to last a lifetime, providing a durable and cost-effective alternative to temporary solutions.

jawbone_health.title: Protection of Jawbone Health
jawbone_health.description: Dental implants stimulate the jawbone and prevent bone loss, maintaining your facial structure and overall oral health.

easy_maintenance.title: Easy Maintenance
easy_maintenance.description: Just like natural teeth, dental implants only require regular brushing, flossing, and dental check-ups—no special care is needed.

transformation.title: Dental Implant Transformations
transformation.description: See the remarkable transformations achieved through our dental implant procedures. Each case represents a real patient's journey to a confident, healthy smile.

smileMakeover.title: Smile Makeover
smileMakeover.description: It is a comprehensive cosmetic treatment that transforms your smile with a blend of procedures.

dentalVeneers.title: Dental Veneers
dentalVeneers.description: Veneers are a popular cosmetic treatment in dental tourism, ideal for achieving a flawless, bright smile.

allOnImplants.title: All-on-4/6 Implants
allOnImplants.description: Offer a fixed, full-arch solution for patients with multiple missing teeth. It provides durability and a natural look.

dentalCrowns.title: Dental Crowns
dentalCrowns.description: A popular solution for restoring damaged or weakened teeth, providing strength, and protection.

surgicalDentistry.title: Surgical Dentistry
surgicalDentistry.description: Procedures aimed at addressing complex dental issues, including extractions, gum and bone surgeries.

about.label: About Us
about.title: Exceptional Dental Expertise, Designed to Fit Every Budget.
about.description: At Avenue Clinic, we combine personalized care with cutting-edge dental technology to deliver outstanding results across general, cosmetic, and advanced treatments. Our trusted team uses internationally acclaimed materials—offering premium care in Istanbul at prices up to 70% lower than global standards.

vision_section.mission_desc: We aim to make premium dental care accessible, empowering healthier, more confident smiles through personalized and compassionate service.
vision_section.vision_desc: Our vision is to lead in providing affordable, world-class dental care that transforms lives and builds trust, setting a new global standard in quality, accessibility, and patient-focused treatment.
vision_section.value_desc: Our value is upholding transparency and honesty in all aspects of patient care and service, and treating every patient with empathy, respect, and personalized attention to ensure a comfortable experience.

about.healthy_smiles_trust: Driven by a Vision of Healthy Smiles and Lasting Trust.

expertise.title: Commitment to Excellence in Specialized Dental Care

features.title: Advanced Technology
features.description: State-of-the-art equipment and modern techniques for precise, comfortable treatments.

features.title: Expert Team
features.description: Highly skilled dental professionals with extensive experience in cosmetic and restorative procedures.

features.title: Quality Materials
features.description: Premium, globally recognized dental materials ensuring lasting results.

whyUs.label: WHY CHOOSE US
whyUs.title: Exceptional Quality and Affordability
whyUs.description: Experience world-class dental care that combines advanced technology, expert professionals, and premium materials - all at prices that make quality dental care accessible to everyone.

professionals.title: Expert Professionals
professionals.description: Our team of highly skilled dentists brings years of experience and expertise in delivering exceptional dental care.

satisfaction.title: Patient Satisfaction
satisfaction.description: We prioritize your comfort and satisfaction, ensuring a positive experience throughout your dental journey.

materials.title: Top-Quality Materials
materials.description: Our focus on top-grade materials guarantees that each procedure meets the highest standards of safety, longevity, and patient satisfaction.

patientJourney.label: PATIENT JOURNEY
patientJourney.title: Your Journey with Medico Clinic
patientJourney.description: Embark on a carefully crafted journey where your comfort, safety, and satisfaction come first. From a detailed online consultation to personalized treatment and dedicated post-care, every step with Medico Clinic is designed to provide a world-class experience.

slide1.title: #1 - Online Consultation
slide1.description: Begin your journey with a comprehensive online consultation. Our expert team will review your dental concerns, medical history, and treatment goals to create a personalized care plan tailored to your needs.

slide2.title: #2 - Treatment Planning
slide2.description: Receive a detailed treatment plan outlining procedures, timeline, and costs. Our team will address all your questions and ensure you're fully informed about your upcoming dental care journey.

slide3.title: #3 - Travel Arrangements
slide3.description: Once you're ready to proceed, our dedicated team will assist you with travel arrangements, accommodation recommendations, and scheduling your treatment dates for a seamless experience.

slide4.title: #4 - Arrival & Welcome
slide4.description: Upon arrival in Istanbul, experience our warm hospitality. You'll be greeted by our team and transported to your accommodation, ensuring a comfortable start to your dental journey.

slide5.title: #5 - The Procedure
slide5.description: Your treatment will be performed by our expert dental team using advanced technology and premium materials. We prioritize your comfort and safety throughout the entire process.

slide6.title: #6 - Recovery & Care
slide6.description: Receive comprehensive post-treatment care instructions and support. Our team remains available to address any concerns during your recovery period.

slide7.title: #7 - Departure
slide7.description: As your journey concludes, depart with a renewed sense of confidence, knowing your experience was led by professionals who prioritize your care and comfort at every step. From your initial consultation to your final check-up, Medico Clinic is committed to delivering a seamless, exceptional experience.

testimonials.title: Real stories of exceptional care and transformative smiles

transformation.title: Stunning results that showcase the life changing impact

contact.title: Get Your FREE Dental Report
contact.subtitle: Submit your info and get a quote personalized to your needs.

faq.title: Everything you need to know about our treatments
faq.subtitle: Find quick answers to common questions about our dental treatments, procedures, and patient care in our FAQ section.

treatments.question: What types of dental treatments do you offer?
treatments.answer: We provide a comprehensive range of dental treatments, including preventive care, cosmetic dentistry, restorative treatments, and oral surgery. Our services include dental implants, veneers, crowns, teeth whitening, orthodontics, and full smile makeovers, among others. Each treatment is tailored to meet your unique needs and help you achieve a healthier, more confident smile.

affordability.question: Are your treatments affordable compared to other countries?
affordability.answer: Yes, Medico Clinic offers top-quality dental treatments at up to 70% more affordable rates than in many other countries, without compromising on quality. We partner with globally trusted brands to ensure high standards in materials and technology, delivering excellent results at competitive prices.

rightTreatment.question: How do I know which dental treatment is right for me?
rightTreatment.answer: Our expert team will guide you through a detailed consultation and diagnostic process, using advanced technology to assess your dental health. Based on this assessment, we'll recommend the most suitable treatment options that align with your goals, whether it's improving function, aesthetics, or overall oral health.

materials.question: Do you use high-quality materials for dental treatments?
materials.answer: Absolutely. We only use top-grade materials from renowned global brands, ensuring durability, comfort, and a natural look for each treatment. Our focus on quality materials guarantees that your dental work will stand the test of time, giving you lasting results you can trust.

duration.question: How long does it take to complete dental treatments?
duration.answer: Treatment duration depends on the specific procedure and your unique needs. Some treatments, like Hollywood Smile, can be completed in a single visit, while others, like dental implants or orthodontics, may require multiple visits over a few months. Our team will provide a clear timeline during your initial consultation to help you plan accordingly.
